Class NoTimeBasedGeneratedBarsBuilder<T>

Namespace
FinScript.StdLib.BarsTypes.Base
Assembly
FinScript.StdLib.dll

This builder allows to creates bars not aligned to basic timeframe For inheritors, comparing bar times should not make sense. For simplicity, each call of OnSourceBarUpdated(DateTime, double, double, double, double, in Quantity, bool) generates emulated bar time always greater or equal to the last bar time by 1 tick

public abstract class NoTimeBasedGeneratedBarsBuilder<T> : GeneratedBarsBuilder<T> where T : GeneratedBarsPeriod, new()

OnSourceBarUpdatedAutoTime(double, double, double, double, in Quantity)

Same to OnSourceBarUpdated(DateTime, double, double, double, double, in Quantity, bool) but without bar time. The parameter removed intentionally to prevent any chance to use time in a builder's logic

protected abstract void OnSourceBarUpdatedAutoTime(double open, double high, double low, double close, in Quantity volume)

ResetLastBarAutoTime(double, double, in Quantity)

Exchange the last bar with new values, including open. High and low are calculated from open and close

UpdateLastBarAutoTime(double, in Quantity)

Updates last bar with new close price. Pay attention that high and low ofd the last bar may be also modified if new close is out of high-low ranges

protected void UpdateLastBarAutoTime(double close, in Quantity volumeAdded)

Parameters

close double
volumeAdded Quantity

UpdateLastBarAutoTime(double, double, double, in Quantity)

Updates last bar with new incoming values. Pay attention that incoming data is summed up with previous data: new high will be max of incoming high and previous high, new low will be min of incoming low and previous low, the incoming volume will be added to existing

protected void UpdateLastBarAutoTime(double high, double low, double close, in Quantity volumeAdded)

Parameters

high double
low double
close double
volumeAdded Quantity
